content: aloha here s stitch amigurumi in a very cute open mouth design inspired by the animated movie lilo and stitch he d like to give you a great big hug or a great big scare with his wide alien mouth complete with tiny teeth stitch amigurumi is my latest free crochet pattern in my open mouth amigurumi series 1 his other features include his large ears claws with paws tear shaped eyes and markings on his back bonus accessory pattern also includes a very fun hula skirt video tutorial is also available with the free written pattern so you can crochet along with me as well if you wish stitch would love to be part of your family ohana happy crocheting cheers ami amour ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** make sure you tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 i d love to see **youtube** check out my youtube channel 3 to catch all my crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 6in/15cm tall standing **level ** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet half_double_crochet puff i show how to do this in the video tutorial too how to increase how to decrease how to sew parts together 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/open-mouth-amigurumi-series 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
